[h1]“Cake?”[/h1]
Review by Unam 

The concept of Portal is such an intriguing one, and this game fully pushes its players to the absolute limit with it. Some of the puzzles in this game are truly mind-boggling and leave the player thinking “How the hell did they do that?”, it its some seriously impressive stuff. GLaDOS is such an iconic villain, not by how menacing and terrible she is, but by the fact that she's just very charming and funny to hear. Challenge mode is super cool, as even an expert player might have to think of them very thoroughly. 

However, the game has a few problems. One of them is the playtime, as the story is pretty short and the challenge levels do run out. The lack of Steam Workshop support really hurts this one. Also, the lack of Co-op is also a big loss, as experiencing it with a friend is always a blast.

Overall, pretty solid game. Although the predecessor surpasses it in almost every way, Portal is still a flawed, yet fun and challenging puzzler that is at least worth a playthrough. 

I give Portal a...
[h2]7/10[/h2]

现在是2022年，当我真的玩进去的时候直接被震撼了。
无法用语言形容，只能说不管你玩过多少种类型游戏只要是你第一次玩传送门，你一定从来没体验过这种游戏，这种感觉。
从游戏方式到配音到剧情，一切都在悄然展开。
从建立一个简单的传送门到可以建立两个再到用传送枪学习更多的技巧；
从第一次你听到GLaDOS的配音不过只是冷酷无情的机器人到到游戏中段的各种变调声再到最后的犹如精神分裂的人和你对话；
从一开始只是实验室到后面发现竟然还有隐藏的房间竟然还有别的实验者，并没有表面上看着这么简单；
需要动辄几百个G可用存储空间和大段cg来表现吗？NO,传送门告诉我不用而且故事照样精彩。

通关之后：欧耶通关了! 我是聪明逼
看完开发者注释：卧槽牛逼，V社教我玩游戏，我是小白鼠
打完最少传送门：原来还能这样过关，我是傻逼
如果你还没玩过传送门，那你一定不能错过这款游戏。非要形容可能就像是当时的人们第一次玩3D射击游戏雷神之锤和DOOM那种感觉吧。

[h1] Konu [/h1]
[i] Elinize bir portal cihazı veriliyor ve etrafa turuncu-mavi portallar açarak bulmacaları tamamlıyorsunuz.
Mavi portaldan atlayınca turuncu portaldan çıkıyorsunuz. [/i]
[h1] Grafik ve Sesleri [/h1]
[i] Grafikler zamanına göre  güzel ve şu anda da yeterli, oyun zaten bulmaca tarzında olduğu için grafikler çok da önemli değil  ama her şekilde tatmin edici.
Oyunun sesleri güzel, türkçe alt yazı bulunuyor. Sizi yönlendiren robotik bir ses bulunuyor ve oyuna esrarengiz bir hava katıyor [/i]
[h1] Diğer [/h1]
[i] İlk başlarda beynim yandı, sağa portal açıyorsun soldan çıkıyorsun, yere portal açıyorsun açtığın yerden çıkıyorsun falan harbiden oyun çok ilginç. Kesinlikle denemenizi öneririm. İndirimlerde çok ucuza alabilirsiniz [/i]

I once heard someone say that anyone playing games on a PC should make their first one Portal, and I agree 100%. It's a short game with some big brain puzzles, an amazing atmosphere, and enough questions to allow the speculative type to go wild. This game will give an experience you'll never forget.

Definitivamente não é meu estilo de jogo preferido, mas se consegui chegar até o final me divertindo, isso diz que o jogo é muito bom. Bem criativo, com ótima gameplay e com uma história até legalzinha, o jogo definitivamente se supera no gênero escolhido. A trilha sonora é legal e o jogo tem bom desempenho durante a gameplay. É desafiador sem ser irritante. Em resumo é um excelente jogo de puzzle que com toda certeza vale-se conferir.

A groundbreaking innovation of genre in games and is easily one of the most creative and fun games of all time with games such as Minecraft, and GTA in regards to originality. Its story is also very interesting and mysterious leaving the viewer with many questions to be solved outside of the game. Who is ratman, how did you end up in the Aperture facility. Replayability is ok if speedrunning tickles your fancy. Would for sure reccomend to anyone who SOMEHOW havent played this masterpiece already. Everyone and their mom seem to have at least heard of this gem. Its low price should also intrigue you.

Portal – Добро пожаловать в интересное приключение. Эта игра в жанре головоломка от первого лица.  Сюжет очень прост, и в тоже время увлекателен. Графически игра сохранилась не очень хорошо, но глаз это сильно не режет. Игра стоит Вашего внимания! Хотя определённо уступает второй части. Рекомендую всем, любителям загадок, посмеяться над искромётными шутками. Эта игра для вас!
